text:
Twice now I have gone to setup the maudit task & each time it keeps failing due
to missing settings.

I have found the solution in an email from Stephane Bailliez
http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=ant-user&m=101178355611948&w=2

But I had to search for it each time, so here it is as a patch to the docs.

Jesse
creator: jesse@cryptocard.com
